  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:6555a09c-b322-11d8-a944-00105adcec29</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>6555a09c-b322-11d8-a944-00105adcec29</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A csodálatos Hale-Bopp-üstökös ion- és porcsóvája</string>
            <string language="en-US">The ion and dust tail of the fantastic Hale-Bopp comet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ion und das Staubendstück des fantastischen 
Hale-Bopp-Bopp Kometen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ion et la queue de la poussière de la comète 
Vigoureuse-Bopp fantastique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O íon e a cauda da poeira do cometa 
hale-Bopp-Bopp fantástico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo ione e la coda della polvere della cometa 
hale-Bopp-Bopp fantastica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ουρά ιόντων και σκόνης του φανταστικού κομήτη 
υγιής- Bopp</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ion y la cola del polvo del cometa Sano-Bopp 
fantástico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az 1997-ben napközelben járt Hale-Bopp-üstökös a magjából elpárolgó anyagból gyönyörű ion- (kék) és porcsóvát (sárgásfehér) növesztett</string>
            <string language="en-US">In 1997 the Hale-Bopp comet developed a beautiful ion (blue) and dust (yellow-white) tail of the substance vapouring from the core of the Sun, when it flew nearby it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">égitestek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">apró égitestek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kisbolygók</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">holdak</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In 1997 entwickelte der Hale-Bopp-Bopp Komet ein 
schönes Ion (blau) und (gelb-weißes) Endstück des Staubes der 
Substanz, die vom Kern der Sonne vapouring ist, als er in der Nähe 
sie flog.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans 1997 la comète Vigoureuse-Bopp a 
développé un bel ion (bleu) et la queue (jaune-blanche) de la 
poussière de la substance se vaporisant du noyau du soleil, quand 
elle l'a volé tout près.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em 1997 o cometa hale-Bopp-Bopp desenvolveu um 
íon bonito (azul) e a cauda (amarelo-branca) da poeira da substância
que vaporiza do núcleo do sol, quando o voou próximo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In 1997 la cometa hale-Bopp-Bopp ha sviluppato 
uno ione bello (blu) e la coda (giallo-bianca) della polvere della 
sostanza che vapouring dal nucleo del sole, quando lo ha volato qui 
vicino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το 1997 ο κομήτης υγιής- Bopp ανέπτυξε μια 
όμορφη ουρά ιόντων (μπλε) και σκόνης (κίτρινος-λευκό) της 
ουσίας poy από τον πυρήνα του ήλιου, όταν την πέταξε εδώ 
κοντά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En 1997 el cometa Sano-Bopp desarrolló un ion 
hermoso (azul) y la cola (amarillo-blanca) del polvo de la sustancia 
que se vaporizaba de la base del sol, cuando lo voló cerca.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστρονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
